channel.title: Buying Gold safeness?
channel.description:
Friends and I were looking into buying gold, but since I'm fairly new back into RS2007 my friend they started actually tracking and banning for people buying it by tracking the bots.
Anyone buy gold, or know how safe it is anymore? I've done it before (pre-2009) and never had an issue.

item.title: Buying Gold safeness?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

most sites are pretty safe in terms of receiving the money, but if one of those RWT accounts goes down, your account could now be at risk as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying Gold safeness?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:

Friends and I were looking into buying gold, but since I’m fairly new back into RS2007 my friend they started actually tracking and banning for people buying it by tracking the bots.

Anyone buy gold, or know how safe it is anymore? I’ve done it before (pre-2009) and never had an issue.
[/quote]

Buy bonds on website. 100% safe.[/quote]also more expensive
$6 - 2.6m
$3 - 2m
